pr_title: KOGITO-1189 : Kogito Quick Starts Scripts / User Tasks with Security Update

timeline.message: KOGITO-1189 : Kogito Quick Starts Scripts / User Tasks with Security Update

timeline.bodyText: That's basically what's above, seems redundant (and conflicting in a few fields).
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText:
The lists seems visually to be part of the previous one. Plus there's no introduction of what the screenshots show. Please add there, before this list, a few words mentioning:

the file that is being shown (at least the name, or path within repo)
what tools it is being shown in (just a note, not necessarily full list)
possibly also indicate that there's direct connection between the diagram and steps below
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
